content: the colloquium is now back in full swing, and next week we have Dan Christensen talking about ∞-toposes and type theory. details to follow!

Zoom link: https://topos-institute.zoom.us/j/5344862882?pwd=Znh3UlUrek41T3RLQXJVRVNkM3Ewdz09
YouTube link: https://youtu.be/_0sEEAMwHzo
More details: https://topos.site/topos-colloquium

Abstract:
This talk will be an introduction to homotopy type theory that will explain how it can be used to prove theorems that hold in any ∞-topos. I will introduce the basic ideas of type theory and give some intuition for what these mean homotopically. I will end by giving examples of results proved in homotopy type theory that tell us new results in any ∞-topos. No prior knowledge of type theory or ∞-category theory will be assumed.

the talk will take place on the 1st of April (no joke) at 17:00 UTC
warning: Europe will have entered summer time by then, so this will seem to be an hour later for all of us over here!
